detail_desc: Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Kimono in a patterned crêpe weave with low dropped shoulders and side pockets.
Suede trainers with lacing, a lightly padded edge and tongue, mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Fully lined swimsuit with a hole-patterned frill trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a gold-coloured appliqué.

Short dress in woven fabric with a pointed collar and concealed buttons down the front. Pleats at the top for a draped effect and added width, and a more fitted style at the bottom. Dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves and wide cuffs with concealed buttons. Unlined.
Short dress in stretch jersey with short sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with cut-out rips at the top.
Maxi dress in an airy, textured weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a gathered seam under the bust and a seam at the hem of the skirt for added width. Lined at the top.
Lace hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Knee socks in a soft knit with elastication at the top. One pair in a textured knit and one pair in a smooth knit.
Sleeveless playsuit in a stretch, patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with sequins on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbed neckline.
Ankle boots with pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Block-coloured jersey T-shirt in a soft cotton blend.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Puff pants in long-staple cotton with a single frill at the front, three frills at the back and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Leggings in a soft, rib-knit organic cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Mules in imitation leather with covered heels, square toes and a wide foot strap. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 6 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud (sizes 7-10Y with a normal button).
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with a longer hem. Removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a zip down the front, hood with embroidered details and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with hole-knit details. No buttons.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a motif on the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Short lace dress with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top, cycling shorts and hairband in soft cotton. Sleeveless top in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, elastication at the top and a flounced trim at the front. Shorts in jersey with an elasticated waist. Jersey hairband with a decorative bow at the front.

Long, sleeveless dress in an airy, softly draping weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocking at the back. Draping and a wrapover at the top with a gentle V-neck and frill trim at the sides. Lined.

Short-sleeved dress with a sewn-in bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a decorative picot trim around the neckline and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Skirt in double-layered tulle with shimmering spots. Sewn-on bow at the waist.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.

Warm-lined boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with a high shaft with a padded edge, laces at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings, imitation leather insoles and a chunky rubber sole. Heel 4.5 cm.

Wide shirt in sturdy, organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and slim legs.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.

Hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in cotton jersey. Hoodie with a print motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Relaxed-fit jacket in washed cotton denim with worn details. Collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, concealed side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly organic.
Hair elastics in various designs.
Lace top with short cap sleeves. V-neck with a lace trim at the top and scalloped trims at the sleeves and hem. Partly lined.
Sleeveless, fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend.
Long-sleeved top in airy linen jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey.

Wide shirt in a soft weave with a collar, button placket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and buttoned cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Wedge-heel sandals in soft suede with a braided jute trim around the soles and a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a round metal buckle at one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Gently flared dungaree dress in airy cotton twill with straps that cross at the back and fasten with press-studs.
Long-sleeved top in viscose jersey with overlocked edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem, and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 2-4Y).
Jersey top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
Checked scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 45x185 cm.
Puffer gilet with a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood. Zip with a chin guard at the front, welt front pockets and a rounded hem. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in sturdy, patterned jersey with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Double-layered waistband and a slit at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Gathers at the shoulders and a seam with ties at the waist. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, appliqués with sequins and beads at the top and straight legs.
Chiffon blouse with an opening and button at the back of the neck and wide sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, A-line dress in soft, slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders, short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Calf-length skirt in pleated jersey containing glittery threads with a second layer in pleated mesh. Regular waist with a visible, glittery elastic waistband.
Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and metal shoulder strap. Imitation leather inner compartment and a fabric lining. Size approx. 7.5x13.5x23 cm.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Coat in sturdy twill containing some wool with notch lapels, fringes at the front, front pockets, concealed press-studs and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 7 cm.
Hexagonal earrings. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Top in ribbed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Cardigan in rib-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Detachable hood with a print motif and appliqués and an elasticated front edge. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Double-breasted jacket in sturdy bouclé made from a cotton blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Tailored trousers in a stretch weave with two press-studs at the waist and a zip fly. Zipped front pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim, straight legs.

Easy pull-on joggers in soft cotton corduroy. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
